com.cscguru.client.ui

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cscguru.client.ui.Camera
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUpdatable

    public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
implements IUpdatable
    Renders the map, players, mobs, and other entities to the screen. Specifically deals with the "game play area".
    Author:
    Bryan Bennett
